00045 // Ok, eMule and aMule are building incompatible backup files because 
00046 // of the different name. aMule was using ".BAK" and eMule ".bak". 
00047 // This should fix it.
00048 #define   PARTMET_BAK_EXT wxT(".bak")

00072 };

00076 class SourcenameItem
00077 {
00078 public:

00080     int         count;

00083     :
00084     name(n), count(c) {}
00085 };
